snippet: The Goldman Prize goes to Ikal Angelei, a Kenyan activist, for persuading investors to withdraw support for a dam project that would devastate communities dependent on Lake Turkana.
abstract: The Goldman Prize goes to Ikal Angelei, a Kenyan activist, for persuading investors to withdraw support for a dam project that would devastate communities dependent on Lake Turkana.

headline.main: To Fight a Dam, Rather Than 'Live on Your Knees'
